name: Dungeon Cat (Gabriel_216)
description:
WASD - move

This game is a prototype, a lot of content (enemies, combat, sounds, boss, etc) that I had planned was cut so I could submit the game in time. I created all the images in paint.

I was mainly inspired by Hollow Knight for the level design.

I still don't know if I'll keep working on this game.

Hope you enjoy. 

P.S. I left an enemy in the game, but it is still buggy.
